ModMetaData.name: Everything Is A Gene
ModMetaData.author: Fredamabob
ModMetaData.description:
Adds traits as genes, and more
<size=22>Includes:</size>
- Adds skill passions and nonpassions as genes - Adds all base game traits as genes - Pawns that spawn naturally with a trait will have it in their germline (inheritable gene) - Passion and Trait genes will spawn very rarely in genepacks
<size=22>Future Plans:</size> - Add traits from other mods - Balance traits (currently none have metabolic cost, just complexity to avoid pawns spawning with 200% metabolic efficiency..) - Art maybe? - More traits
<size=22>Conflicts:</size> - Won't currently add modded traits as genes, but will still work on basegame (will just generate a lot of warnings in logs)
